backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with authorization, user profiles, and extensive client data structures including progress, pause history, follow‑ups, and comparison helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Handles upgrading old client records by adding an empty follow‑up history field while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented frontend features related to follow‑up sections, prompts, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of all major frontend files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes using an OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, profile setup, routing, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Displays the login screen using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit their name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Modal for activating a client plan by selecting a start date and follow‑up day with validation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Renders a status badge based on client onboarding or plan state.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog prompting whether a follow‑up is done, allowing optional notes and submission.
Displays a client’s follow‑up status and a sortable history table of past entries.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client plan by entering duration and reason with input validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout providing navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Renders weight and body measurement line charts based on client progress data.
Form component allowing users to input and submit body measurements, calling a mutation to save progress and resetting fields on success.
Displays a sortable table of progress entries with trends for weight and formatted measurement values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and client data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with helpers to navigate and extract a client code from the current route.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Renders an individual client profile page with status controls, progress tracking, follow-up prompts, and activation/pause actions.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable list of all clients with status badges and navigation to individual profiles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows client metrics, follow-up lists by weekday, and navigation tools for management overview.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Provides a form to create new clients, compute plan duration, submit onboarding data, and show success confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Utilities for formatting client codes and matching search queries against normalized code values.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various backend error shapes into short user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Implements logic for determining follow-up due status, checking daily entries, and retrieving latest follow-up info.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date and datetime strings.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Computes total plan days, plan end dates, and formats dates for input fields.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Provides utilities to determine client activation and status, generate display status, and compute counts of active, paused, and expired clients.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, existing features, and new feature requests related to client follow‑up status and notes tracking.
